game.name: Princesses Castle Ball
game.description:
It is always amazing to attend the annual castle royal ball. This year princess Ariel, Annie and Ellie have got an opportunity to be appeared as the special guests there. They look very happy and pretty exciting to get this honor and do want to take a chance not to get noticed in the eyes of jury so they have approached you as their personal fashion assistant. Hey ladies! You will have to take care of their overall looks by trying out the maximum possible outfits their wardrobe contains.  

Remember they are going to join the royal ball with their love so try to be fast to dress them up since their boyfriends are waiting for the girls outside. Start with Ariel by choosing a without sleeve light blue and purple gown with ruffles below the waist and pair it with matching blue jewelry with beads and a rose flower in the middle and a pair of matching shoes, and a bouquet of flowers in this HTML5 dressing game! When you are done, click the next button and get ready to help Annie to pick up her desired outfit.  

She will look awesome in a purple gown with some flair below the waist and golden ribbons on the neck and a pair of purple shoes, a necklace with purple rose flowers, and a bouquet of light purple flowers. Your next turn is to dress up Ellie in this cool brand new girls game. Give your girl a dark purple and pink color long outfit with design on the top and waist and open in the bottom! Pair her look with the same color shoes, jewelry items, and a butterfly shaped face mask! Play more funny and engaging dress up games and have fun without download!
